a1: I like Arsenal as well, they are a good team.
a2: Looking a lot better than last season, be interesting to watch this year.
q3: Probably, they must work very hard to be the next champions
a3: They can at least make the final though surely?
q4: Manchester City’s joyous romp to the Premier League title presents the manager with a different kind of opportunity
a4: They need more consistency from their defense.
q5: Do you think Ozil will play well?
a5: I think he will play well
